item.title: Shannon add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "May your coming year be filled with magic and dreams and good madness. I hope you read some fine books and kiss someone who thinks you're wonderful, and don't forget to make some art -- write or draw or build or sing or live as only you can. And I hope, somewhere in the next year, you surprise yourself." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh, otherwise they'll kill you." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about." -- Oscar Wilde
